data.title: AMA University
data.meta_description: Main Campus: Maximina St., Villa Arca Subdivision, Project 8, Quezon City. Tel nos. (02) 359-0262, 330-0378, 496-17363.
data.meta_site_name: AMA University and Colleges - The country's first in IT education
data.text:
Campus/ Branch Directory

For “other concerns” you may directly reach AMAES campuses in your area thru their e-mail address listed here:

College Students and Alumni Helpdesk:

You may log here your issues, complaints or reports via AMAES Assist. Creating a Ticket is necessary since we might need some information regarding your account.

IF COMMUTING:

From Munoz Market, Quezon City, ride a jeepney going to Project 8, then get off at Road 20.

From there, ride a tricycle beside Mercury Drug and tell the driver to drop you off at AMA University.
